rows.label: qev091703_MSG0001
rows.name:
All right, Eleonora.
Make with the details on this xeno bounty.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0002
rows.name:
Not sure how interested you'll be, Murderess.
This one doesn't involve killing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0003
rows.name: What?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0004
rows.name: Yeah, he's wanted alive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0005
rows.name: The mark is an Orphean scientist named Lan'cord.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0006
rows.name:
Seems he caused an incident at the water-purification plant.
Hacked the entire robot security crew.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0007
rows.name: So you want us to whack him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0008
rows.name: CAPTURE him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0009
rows.name: But it's so much faster to kill him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0010
rows.name:
The other Orpheans are still hoping
to reach an agreement with him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0011
rows.name: We have to respect their wishes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0012
rows.name: This is why friendship treaties suck.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0013
rows.name:
I'm not kidding, Murderess.
Regardless of your little pen name,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0014
rows.name:
if you violate an interspecies treaty,
I will be VERY cross with you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0015
rows.name: Ugh, fiiine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0016
rows.name: Also, and this is just an extra...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0017
rows.name:
But if you can recover his research data as well,
there's a bonus in it for you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0018
rows.name: My favorite word! Consider it yours, honey-buns.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0019
rows.name: So, where's this Lan'cord now?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0020
rows.name: We don't know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0021
rows.name: You don't expect us to track him from scratch, do you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0022
rows.name:
I certainly do! Why else do you think
we're offering 400,000 credits?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0023
rows.name:
Well, I guess that IS a lot...
And what if we get the research data?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0024
rows.name: Then it's 600,000 in total.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0025
rows.name: Twist my arm already![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0026
rows.name: This clown's gotta be in some Ganglion stronghold, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0027
rows.name: We'll just start picking through 'em.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0028
rows.name:
Maybe we'll find a comm log or
some record of his movements.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0029
rows.name:
Once we know where he's been,
we should be able to figure out where he's at.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0030
rows.name: Your eyes are sparkling.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0031
rows.name:
This one'll be tough, but I have faith.
Just be careful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0032
rows.name: Welcome back. How'd it go?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0033
rows.name:
Easy-peasy. That data and most of Lan'cord
should be arriving any minute.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0034
rows.name: MOST of him?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0035
rows.name: Yeah, the clients may not be thrilled.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0036
rows.name: But he's alive, so I'll get paid. Right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0037
rows.name: Um, probably?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0038
rows.name: If not, someone is going to get most of you next.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0039
rows.name: What?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0040
rows.name: Y-you're just kidding around, right, Murderess?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_JNK0010
rows.name: Tease

rows.label: qev091703_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that the fat reward has made the Murderess giddy.

rows.label: qev091703_JNK0020
rows.name: Explain

rows.label: qev091703_SEL0021
rows.name:
Tell Eleonora that the Orphe talked
too much for the Murderess's taste.

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0041
rows.name:
Well, that explains the deranged look.
And the puddle of drool.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0042
rows.name:
Meanwhile, I'm just a salary girl.
I've never even dreamed of that many credits.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0043
rows.name: Oh yes, I know what that's like.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0044
rows.name:
I often find myself falling asleep whenever the
director general gives one of his speeches.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0045
rows.name: Great story, don't care. Just see that I get paid.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0046
rows.name: ...Ah, there's the authorization now. It came through.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0047
rows.name:
You always have this blissed-out look
when you receive your rewards, Murderess.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0048
rows.name:
Yeah, and it's not creepy at all
that you're watching that closely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0049
rows.name: But I'm one step closer to my dream. So of course I'm happy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_JNK0030
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev091703_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask the Murderess about her dream.

rows.label: qev091703_JNK0040
rows.name: Pry

rows.label: qev091703_SEL0041
rows.name:
Ask the Murderess what credits
have to do with her dream.

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0050
rows.name: What, I haven't told you yet?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0051
rows.name:
I think I mentioned it to Lan'cord,
but I was born a little rich girl.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0052
rows.name: The only daughter and sole heir to the Effinger family fortune.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0053
rows.name:
Until an incident that you ain't gonna ask about
forced me to live as an orphan in the slums.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0054
rows.name: Talk about culture shock.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0055
rows.name: But I didn't give up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0056
rows.name:
I decided I'd earn my own fortune
and rebuild the Effinger name myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0057
rows.name: So yeah. That's kinda my dream.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0058
rows.name: Goodness![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0059
rows.name:
I'm going to save up enough to swim in.
Use it to rebuild the Effinger name.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0060
rows.name: That's pretty much my dream.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0061
rows.name: What's the Effinger name?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0062
rows.name: Mine. Or it was the house I was born into, anyway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0063
rows.name: They were unbelievably rich, till they lost it all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0064
rows.name: After that, I grew up in the slums.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0065
rows.name: Goodness![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0066
rows.name:
Aw, lose the frown, baby. I got paid!
I'm smiling, so why shouldn't you be?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0067
rows.name: This is true.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0068
rows.name: It's nice seeing you so cheerful...if a little strange.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0069
rows.name:
Now that you've got all this money,
perhaps we could all drop by the café for—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0070
rows.name: Yeah, I'm not buying. Ever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0071
rows.name: What?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0071_2
rows.name: Nobody likes a cheapskate, Murderess.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0072
rows.name:
Whatevs. Come on, let's ditch the wet blanket
and start on our next mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091703_MSG0073
rows.name: This dream ain't gonna realize itself.[ST:wait ]
